messages.1000061005: #yFire#w attacks gain a chance to deal extra damage to #yBurned#w enemies.\n#yDamage: +{0}%\nTrigger Chance: {1}%
messages.1000072287:
Enhances Fireball's max charge damage. Press the special attack button to split the flame into three separate blasts. 
#yFireball Max Charge Damage: +{0}%
Damage per Projectile (2nd part): {1}%
Damage per Projectile (3rd part): {2}%
messages.1000096232:
Pumps molten lava from the ground, creates a magma ball, and sends it rolling forward. The magma will explode after a certain distance, inflicting significant damage.
#yFire Magic
#yDamage: {0}%
Burn Attacks: {1}
Damage per Burn: {2}%
messages.1000093731: Enhances Inferno's attack range. Finish casting the skill or press the regular attack button to trigger an explosion that damages enemies and decreases their Critical Resist.\n#yExplosion Damage: {0}% of Inferno damage\nEnemy Critical Resist: -{1}% for {2} sec
messages.1000072285: While using Fire Wall, press the regular attack button to throw a flame in front. \n#yAdditional Hit Damage: {0} - {1}% of Fire Wall damage
messages.1000090395: Creates an explosion where Hot Rod was cast.\n#yDamage per Explosion: {0}% of Hot Rod damage\nTumble to cancel the skill.
messages.1000075701: Allows you to briefly control the summoned ball of magma. #yLeft-click#w to shoot it. The ball will be shot automatically if you do not fire it after a certain amount of time.\n#yBonus Explosion Damage: {0}%
messages.1000098558:
When you use #yFlame Spark#w or #yPhoenix Strike#w, #yFireball EX#w temporarily becomes an instant skill and can deal third-tier damage. When #yPhoenix Strike#w hits, restore #yFireball EX#w Instant's cooldown by {0} sec.

#yDamage: +{1}% 
Fireball and Instant don't share cooldown
messages.1000096231:
Enhances Fireball's max charge damage. Press the special attack button to split the flame into three separate blasts. Causes Burn.
#yFireball Max Charge Damage: +{0}%
Damage per Projectile (2nd part): {1}%
Damage per Projectile (3rd part): {2}%
Burn Attacks: {3}
Damage per Burn: {4}%
messages.1000096233:
Enhances Inferno's attack range. Finish casting the skill or press the regular attack button to trigger an explosion that damages enemies and decreases their Critical Resist. Also causes Burn.
#yExplosion Damage: {0}% of Inferno damage
Enemy Critical Resist: -{1}% for {2} sec
Burn Attacks: {3}
Damage per Burn: {4}%
messages.1000096234:
While using Fire Wall, press the regular attack button to throw a flame in front. Also enhances Fire Wall to cause Burn. 
#yAdditional Hit Damage: {0} - {1}% of Fire Wall damage
Burn Attacks: {2}
Damage per Burn: {3}%
messages.1000096235:
Creates an explosion where Hot Rod was cast. Also enhances Hot Rod to cause Burn. Lifts the restriction on the #ynumber of hits#w.
#yDamage per Explosion: {0}% of Hot Rod damage
Burn Attacks: {1}
Damage per Burn: {2}%
Tumble to cancel the skill while casting it.
